Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

tidyBdE 0.2.22021-10-29

  • BdE starts migrating “Indicadores Económicos” (Economic Indicators) series to the Statistical Bulletin (more info here). Some series on bde_indicators() are likely to be broken in the meantime. So far, these series has been updated:

    • bde_ind_euribor_12m_monthly(): New series code is 587853.

  • Update docs and examples.

tidyBdE 0.2.12021-10-07

  • Update docs and vignettes.
  • bde_series_load() now tries to coerce characters to numeric.
  • Improve messages when inconsistencies between catalog and series.
  • Export bde_check_access().

tidyBdE 0.2.02021-08-04

  • Add series index article.
  • Add new series: bde_ind_gdp_quarterly(), bde_ind_population().
  • Improve package coverage and docs.
  • Move tests to testthat.
  • The following scales have been removed: bde_scale_colour_vivid(), bde_scale_color_vivid(), bde_scale_fill_vivid(), bde_scale_colour_rose(), bde_scale_color_rose() bde_scale_fill_rose(). Use scale_color_bde_c() instead.

tidyBdE 0.1.22021-07-07

  • Precompile vignette.
  • Better handling of errors, according to CRAN rules.
  • Changed some examples.

tidyBdE 0.1.12021-06-05

  • Add vignette to package
  • Color adjustment on bde_rose_pal(): Now hcl spectrum is more consistent between roses and blues according to colorspace::specplot().
  • Add DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4673496
  • New palettes for ggplot2: scale_color_bde_c(), scale_color_bde_d(), scale_fill_bde_c(), scale_fill_bde_d().
  • Deprecated scales: bde_scale_colour_vivid(), bde_scale_color_vivid(), bde_scale_fill_vivid(), bde_scale_colour_rose(), bde_scale_color_rose() bde_scale_fill_rose().

tidyBdE 0.1.02021-04-08

  • Initial release.

Contents

About tidyBdE

Developed by Diego H. Herrero.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.1.

Template by Bootstrapious . Ported to pkgdown by dieghernan.
